comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Believe it or not that's Lester Moon, amateur beekeeper, performing a little larceny on the bees' honey supply. He wears no protective clothing evidently because the bees are so tame that he has little to fear. He keeps his hives behind his house on Thomasville road."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 62155395@N02
comment._content: I was going to say "amateur" is right without any protective clothing!  But now I see the smoking gun.
